text: The name Bogza () may refer to: * Sergey Bogza, Russian-American conductor * Anda-Louise Bogza, Romanian opera soprano * (Gheorghe) "Geo" Bogza (1908–1993), a Romanian poet, avant-garde theorist * Lorena Bogza (born 1971), Romanian-born Moldovan journalist * Nicolae Bogza (1910–1992), Romanian novelist * Bogza, a village in Sihlea Commune, Vrancea County, Romania Category:Romanian-language surnames
title: Bogza
